thread.title: Sam’s Clubs to Accept AmEx Cards
thread.title_full: Sam’s Clubs to Accept AmEx Cards - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Sam’s Clubs to Accept AmEx Cards
text:
American Express said Thursday that Sam’s Club, the warehouse-club retailer owned by Wal-Mart Stores Inc., would accept its plastic starting Oct. 1.
Earlier this year, Sam’s Club’s larger rival Costco Wholesale Corp. ended its 16-year relationship with American Express after the companies failed to agree to new terms. The partnership, under... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
